Text.Text: The Ultimate Production Overlord - This legendary figure from the silver screen will boost your factories to unimaginable heights, turning your production lines into money-printing machines!

The Toon That Adds Peasants - Straight out of Toontown, this animated ace will magically summon extra peasant workers to your Coopers and Cookhouses, making your food and drink production a cartoonishly efficient affair!

The Billionaire Genius Inventor - With his JARVIS-like efficiency, Tony Stark will deploy extra peasant workers to your Artisans and Dressers in Albion, turning your workshops into high-tech production marvels!
